text: The 1923 Marquette Golden Avalanche football team was an American football team that represented Marquette University as an independent during the 1923 college football season. In its second season under head coach Frank Murray, the team compiled an 8–0 record. ==Schedule== ==References== Marquette Category:Marquette Golden Avalanche football seasons Category:College football undefeated seasons Marquette Golden Avalanche football
title: 1923 Marquette Golden Avalanche football team
